product_name: Merrell Ellsworth Capri Tights - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Offering just the right coverage in a super lightweight fabric, the ultra-stretchy and wicking Merrell Ellsworth Capri Tights are invaluable for your cool-weather runs or yoga. Super-stretchy polyester/spandex jersey wicks moisture and breathes to keep you comfortable during workouts. Fabric offers excellent UPF 30 sun protection for outdoor use. Shirring gives the wide waistband on the Merrell Ellsworth Capri Tights a flattering, supportive fit. Closeout.
short_description: Offering just the right coverage in a super lightweight fabric, the ultra-stretchy and wicking Merrell Ellsworth Capri Tights are invaluable for your cool-weather runs or yoga.
